comments: Professional coastal engineering services including coastal studies (hydrographic, hydraulic, wave climate, siltation/erosion, dredging); modeling inspection, assessment, analysis, new design and repairs of coastal infrastructure (breakwaters, shore protection) in various coastal locations within Atlantic Canada.   For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department. This contract was sole-sourced. This contract is a multi-year contract.
